replies.message: This is a great place to ask a question, Ajay. How can we help you? -Jordan

Sir i have a chat page, but some abusers coming by fake pages & abusing all members because They r page hater, it's not easy to online 24 hours, so i request to fb team plz block page to page comments option, or if Page admin not want any page on his page u add this option in page setting, From there we can block all pages on our page, if u want i can give u snapshot of fake pages, i hope fb team will solve my problem. Thanks

We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Ajay. The best way to report abusive content on Facebook is by using the Report link that appears near the content you would like to report. For some examples and to learn more, visit our Help Center at: http://on.fb.me/1mZ7Lpz. -Jordan
Its not possible to report every comment, because they coomes very fast by different fake pages, Only page to page block option is the solution for them
